  1 /************************************************
  2  * if_test -- Simple test of the if statement.  *
  3  ************************************************/
  4 #include <iostream>
  5
  6 int main()
  7 {
  8     int i1 = 12;        // A number
  9     int i2 = 3;         // Another number
 10
 11     if (i1 & i2)
 12         std::cout << "Both numbers are non-zero\n";
 13     else
 14         std::cout << "At least one number is zero\n";
 15     return (0);
 16 }
